text:
Lynn Faulds Wood (25 March 1948 – 24 April 2020) was a Scottish television presenter and journalist. She was born in Glasgow. She was known for her works on "TV-am", "BBC Breakfast Time", "Watchdog", "GMTV" and '. She worked for the BBC and ITV.
Wood died on 24 April 2020 of a stroke, aged 72.
